original_text: “‘Do not have sexual relations with the sister of either your mother or your father, for that would dishonor a close relative; both of you would be held responsible.
korean_text: 네 이모나 고모의 하체를 범하지 말지니 이는 살붙이의 하체인즉 그들이 그들의 죄를 담당하리라

sentences.original_text: with the sister of either your mother
for that would dishonor a close relative
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 가까운 친척을 욕되게 할 것이기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: both of you would be held responsible
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 둘 다 책임을 져야 할 것이다
